SEARCH
Package ca.openosp.openo.webserv.rest

Class RxLookupService

java.lang.Object
ca.openosp.openo.webserv.rest.AbstractServiceImpl
ca.openosp.openo.webserv.rest.RxLookupService
@Path("/rxlookup") @Component("rxLookupService") @Produces("application/xml") public class RxLookupService extends AbstractServiceImpl
Class that allows access to DrugRef, or other drug product database.

  • Method Details

    • search

      @GET @Path("/search") @Produces("application/json") public DrugLookupResponse search(@QueryParam("string") String s)
      Performs a search in the drug product database for a drug that matches in input parameter.
      Parameters:
      s - a drug name to search in the drug product database.
      Returns:
      response containing a list of DrugSearchTo1 objects representing the drugs that matched in the search.

    • details

      @GET @Path("/details") @Produces("application/json") public DrugLookupResponse details(@QueryParam("id") String s)
      Gets details of a specific drug product
      Parameters:
      s - the id of the drug product
      Returns:
      a response object with a single drug search object represented the details.

    • parseInstructions

      @POST @Path("/parse") @Produces public DrugResponse parseInstructions(@QueryParam("input") String instructions)
      Extracts medication instruction details (frequency, dose, etc...) from an instruction string.

      Uses the same parser as the old Rx2 interface did.

      Parameters:
      instructions - the string to parse
      Returns:
      a partially populated drug object with the extracted fields populated.
